title: 'Jihadi John' Revealed To Be Middle-Class Brit
teaser: Intelligence agents say the man in ISIS videos is Mohammed Emwazi, a Kuwaiti-born, college-educated Londoner in his mid-20s.
contentencoded:
Intelligence agents now say the man shown in ISIS videos apparently beheading American journalist James Foley last summer is a Kuwaiti-born, college-educated Londoner in his mid-20s named Mohammed Emwazi.

Emwazi has been in Syria since 2012, and he reportedly became radicalized on a trip to Tanzania during which he was detained and questioned by police.

Barney Henderson has been covering the story for The Telegraph and joins Here & Now’s Robin Young with details.

Guest

  • Barney Henderson, world news editor of The Telegraph in London. He tweets @barneyhenderson.
